subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks coach’s search for answers — to a skid, a defensive slump and a punchless bench — has led him back to Ronny Turiaf, and a lineup change that he hopes will be permanent.
snippet: The Knicks coach’s search for answers — to a skid, a defensive slump and a punchless bench — has led him back to Ronny Turiaf, and a lineup change that he hopes will be permanent.
